conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Hello, what would you like to talk about today?

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: I am struggling in my marriage. We keep having the same arguments.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: That sounds difficult. What patterns do you notice in these arguments?

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: We fight about communication mostly. I feel like my partner doesn't listen to me.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: When you say they don't listen, what does that look like specifically?

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: They interrupt me, scroll on their phone, or just walk away mid-conversation.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: How does that make you feel in those moments?

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: Frustrated and unimportant. Like my feelings don't matter.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Have you shared these specific feelings about being unheard with your partner?

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: Not directly... I guess I just complain about the behavior instead.
